name: qqmusic_mcp
description: Defines MCP tools that allow AI clients to search QQ Music and resolve playback URLs.

tools.description: Search QQ Music by lyric keywords and return normalized song metadata.

lyrics.description: Lyrics fragment or song title to search for.
lyrics.title: Lyrics

limit.description: Maximum number of songs to return.
limit.title: Limit

tools.description: Retrieve a playback URL for a given QQ Music songmid and quality.

file_type.description: Desired audio quality code; available options: 'm4a', '128', '320', 'flac' (default: '128').
file_type.title: File Type
